name: Screen Domain
description:
The evil spirit is awake and he wants to destroy the world, the only way to defeat it is purifying the mountain of evil. Are you ready for this fight?

Screen Domain was made for Ludum Dare #31, the theme was Entire Game on One Screen

Visual Asset made by Pedro Rodrigo
Produce by Rafael Endo and Pedro Rodrigo
Music by: DST, take from this site - http://www.nosoapradio.us

Goal: Defeat the Evil Mountain and protect your Main Castle
Control: Mouse

Tips:

1- More Base, more Power
2- Yellow bar is your stamina
3-To fight against the Evil Spirit, go to same place he is
